movements.notes: follows immediately after the Lento and is followed by a repeat of the same Lento

sources.autograph: Paris, Bibl. de l'Opéra, Réserve 597 (8). 'Mese di Aprile 1792. Quartettino per due violini, viola e violoncello obbto di Luigi Boccherini, compositor di camera di S. M. il Re di Prussia'.
sources.ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.598. Copy made in Berlin for Frederick William II. Mulhouse, Bibl. Municipale, MN.4862 (19th century). Paris, Conservatoire, D.11162, in the hand of Picquot, with a note: 'très beau'.
